main event: An unusual radar sighting was reported on May 3, 1959, near Pease Air Force Base in New Hampshire.
interesting points: Tracks were detected by radar with speeds of 200-400 knots,Tracks appeared to be intelligently controlled and highly maneuverable,Tracks formed a circular pattern at altitudes up to 35,000 ft,The report suggests the possibility of real unidentified objects despite some agencies considering them false targets,Scattered clouds were reported between 8,000 and 10,000 ft during the observation.
location: Pease Air Force Base, New Hampshire, USA
witness description: There are no confirmed witnesses reported in the document.
